Articles.Content:
Whats a good way to simulate 2 vessels that have docked?

I\'m thinking of using 12 lander legs, to catch each other, and a crew tunnel etc.
i think that\'s the best option, but i find it rather hard to do it without mods
Will work up to a time warp of 2x.. Anything above and the physics stop workin and the ships will drift apart
